channel.title: Adding Npcs
channel.description: Hey guys how do i add npcs? I am using Choob Isle Pk 1 as a base. I want to add a few more npcs. Also Please tell me how to make safe zones.

item.title: Adding Npcs
item.dc:creator: @nick6554 nick6554
item.description:
@nick6554 wrote:

open autospawn.cfg and copy paste this:

spawn = NPCID SPAWNPOINTCOORDX SPAWNCOORDY Hight NPCWALKRANGEX1 NPCWALKRANGEY1 NPCWALKRANGE2 NPCWALKRANGE2 NPCWALKTYPE NPCNAME

ok npc id is the id of the npc spawn point coord x is the coord x of where the npc shall spawn hight is the hight of the npc (0 is ground level) Npc walkrange is from where the npc is allowed to chase somone and npcname is just for reference no know the npcs name

and npc walktype 1 is for a shop and 2 is for a monster

heres and example to spawn a man in fally

spawn = 3223 2962 3383 0 2961 3383 2969 3385 2 Man (fally)

compile when your done and check results in game

Read full topic
